resources.string:
When the schedule of your Booking comes, please do the following: 
• Prepare your payment. 
• Go to your designated Starting Station. 
• Tell your Booking ID to the receptionist. 
• Ride into the E-Vehicle with your assigned driver.
You can only cancel your booking while it is \"Processing\". Once the status becomes \"Booked\", you cannot cancel it anymore. Please be sure of your decision.
Online Payment must be settled until 24 HOURS BEFORE THE BOOKING SCHEDULE, to give the admins a suitable amount of time to confirm the payment details.

The method of paying online is through G-Cash Application. 
Here are the steps to process your online payment. 
• Go to the booking record of your desire with status of Processing or Booked in order to an online payment. 
• Tap on the online payment button to go to the online payment screen. 
• Send your payment depending on the amount cost of your booked tour to the numbers showed on the online payment screen. 
• Retrieve the transaction's reference number and put it in the input box. 
• Tap on the confirm button and wait for the admin to process your online payment. 
• You can request for a refund if you cancelled your booking or failed to go to the tour.
Avoid paying online if you are being indecisive about going to your booked tour to prevent any inconvenience.
